problem.p: Driving a car in the positive x direction at a speed of 60 MPH, Mary tests her brakes by coming to a complete stop in 4 seconds. Then she accelerates to her original speed of 60 MPH in 8 seconds. A motion diagram is created by illuminating her car with a strobe at 2 second intervals. Which of the following best represents the correct diagram? Mary's car is represented by a dot.
